title: Inflation rate in Argentina 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 10.9 was reported at Year 2006
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 6.27 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
